attributes.action: award Chris Foley with a knighthood for services to testing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Chris Foley clearly deserves a knighthood for his devotion to the testing industry. Without which such testing frameworks such as the Inverted Quadrangle and the Italian Waterfall would not have been created. Please join me in asking for this titel to be granted.
